JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles Responsibilities:     Design and develop solutions that manage data across public and hybrid cloud environments     Build solutions that manage data residing in public cloud created by cloud native apps     Define component architecture, evaluate feasibility, develop for quality and robustness     Optimize design for scale-out, performance and cost     Work directly with key customers as required     Requirements:     5+ years of experience developing commercial products     2+ years of experience with public and/or hybrid cloud infrastructures     Solid object-oriented programming background and work experience     Excellent ability to create minimalist designs that simply work     Solid grasp of computer science fundamentals and especially data structures, algorithms, multi-threading     Bachelors or higher in computer science or equivalent degree     Strongly Desired:     Experience developing commercial resilient web services     Hands on experience with one or major public cloud environments AWS, Azure or GCP     Experience developing distributed and highly available systems     Background in performance analysis
